titleStmt.title: The fathers legacie VVith precepts morall, and prayers diuine: fitted for all sorts, both yong and old, times and seasons: morning, noone, and night.
titleStmt.author: Norden, John, 1548-1625?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by M. Flesher] for Iohn Marriot, in Saint Dunstans Church-yard in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
